Description:
Detects the pattern of a pipe name as used by the hack tool CoercedPotato

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - CoercedPotato Named Pipe Creation
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where pipe_name like '%\coerced\%'
